textBox.richText: Anindya and Venky presented few weeks ago 2 papers at ICASSP in Dallas (USA) and 1 paper at ACM Symposium on Applied Computing in Sierre (CH): A. Roy and S. Marcel. “Boosted binary features for noise-robust speaker verification”. In IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing (ICASSP), 2010.  V. Subburaman and S. Marcel. “An alternative scanning strategy to detect faces”. In IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing (ICASSP), 2010. A. Roy and S. Marcel. “Visual processing-inspired fern-audio features for noise-robust speaker verification”. In ACM 25th Symposium on Applied Computing, 2010.
